name: Probiotic Strawberry Soda
ingredients:
3 cups Water Kefir
2 cups Hulled Fresh Strawberries
¼ cups Apple Juice
1 Tablespoon Honey
description: A probiotic strawberry soda made with water kefir and fresh strawberry puree. It’s refreshing and will increase your energy and vitality.

name: Oatmeal Coconut Pecan Cookies
ingredients:
2 sticks Unsalted Butter, Softened
¾ cups Brown Sugar, Packed
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
2 whole Eggs
1 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract
1-¼ cup All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Salt
2-½ cups Uncooked Oats
1 cup Pecans, Finely Chopped
1 cup Sweetened Coconut Flakes
1 Tablespoon Unsalted Butter, Softened For Greasing The Pans
description: These Oatmeal Coconut Pecan Cookies are a great snack or dessert the whole family can enjoy.

name: Faux Butterfinger Balls
ingredients:
2 cups Candy Corn
15 ounces, weight Creamy Peanut Butter (not Natural)
12 ounces, weight Dark Cocoa Candy Melts
description: A simple recipe made using candy corn. Tastes exactly like a Butterfinger candy bar.

name: Pea Salad
ingredients:
⅓ cups Sour Cream
1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise
1 Tablespoon Salt And Pepper
4 cups White Vinegar
8 slices Frozen Green Peas, Almost Totally Thawed
½ whole Bacon, Cooked Until Crisp And Chopped
6 ounces, weight Small Red Onion, Halved And Sliced Very Thin
3 Tablespoons Cheddar Or American Cheese, Cut Into Small Cubes
description: A favorite from childhood! Pea salad with big chunks of cheese and bits of bacon. Tasty!

name: Tuna with Mango Citrus Salsa
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE SALSA:
¼ cups Diced Fresh Mango
½ cups Diced Pepper, Preferably Green Or Red
¼  Diced Fresh Orange (We Used Tangelo )
1 dash Lime, Juiced
1 dash Salt
1 teaspoon Sugar
1 dash Chopped Garlic
¼ cups Soy Sauce
2  Chopped Cilantro
1 Tablespoon FOR THE TUNA:
description: A light and healthy yet wonderfully flavorful meal, perfect for Lent or any time. Great with the warmer weather in our sights.

name: Shrimp & Grits
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE GRITS:
1 cup Heavy Cream
½ cups Whole Milk
1 cup Grits
1 Tablespoon Gruyère Cheese, Shredded
1 Tablespoon Butter
1  FOR THE SHRIMP:
1 clove Olive Oil
½ pounds Small Onion, Chopped Fine
¼ cups Garlic, Chopped
1 cup Andouille Sausage, Slice Into 1” Pieces
1  All-purpose Flour
1 pound Chicken Stock
½  Bay Leaf
description: Shrimp & Grits is low country comfort food. Creamy cheese grits are smothered in shrimp and andouille gravy.

name: Zesty Cilantro-Lime Rice
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Divided
½ cups Diced White Onion
½ Tablespoons Minced Garlic
⅛ teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes
1 cup White Rice (long Grained Preferred)
2 cups Low Sodium Chicken Stock Or Vegetable Stock
¼ teaspoons Kosher Salt
½ cups Chopped Cilantro
2 Tablespoons Fresh Lime Juice
1  Lime, Zested
description: Bright and zesty rice that pairs well with any Latin main dish!

name: Pecan-Crusted Honey Mustard Salmon
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Dijon Mustard
1 Tablespoon Butter, Melted
2 teaspoons (heaping) Honey
¼ cups Panko
¼ cups Finely Chopped Pecans, Measured After Chopping (I Left A Few Larger Chunks For Texture)
¼ teaspoons Dried Basil
¼ teaspoons Garlic Powder
2 whole (6 Oz. Size) Atlantic Salmon Fillets, Skin On One Side
1 pinch Salt And Pepper, to taste
1 whole Lemon, Sliced, If Desired
description: Flaky salmon smothered in a tangy honey mustard sauce and coated in crunchy pecans!

name: Milk Chocolate-Covered Clusters
ingredients:
12 ounces, weight Milk Chocolate Chips
3 cups Golden Grahams Cereal
½ cups Golden Raisins
1-½ cup Mini Marshmallows
description: Milk chocolate-covered clusters with marshmallows, raisins, and Golden Grahams cereal are sure to be a hit during your Easter feast. Only 4 ingredients required.

name: Roasted Potato Bunnies
ingredients:
6 whole Large Potatoes, Sweet Potatoes Or Yams
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Salt
1 sprig Fresh Rosemary
description: Easter is just around the corner, and I’ve come up with an easy way to make your holiday meal a little more festive. My roasted potato bunnies will put a smile on the faces of your family and friends.  They work equally well for brunch or dinner and they’re very easy to make.

name: Lemon Thyme Bourbon Cocktail
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE THYME AND LEMON SIMPLE SYRUP:
1-½ cup Sugar
½ bunches Water
1 whole Thyme
1 ounce, fluid Lemon, Rind
1 ounce, fluid FOR THE COCKTAIL:
1 ounce, fluid Lemon Juice
1 sprig Thyme And Lemon Simple Syrup
description: This is a fantastic, refreshing cocktail that is simple and perfect for spring!

name: Coconut Carrot Easter Cake
ingredients:
8 whole FOR THE CARROT CAKE:
1 cup Carrots, Peeled And Shredded On The Smallest Holes Of A Box Grater
1 cup Shredded Coconut
½ cups Chopped Walnuts
2 cups Currants
2 teaspoons Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1 cup Ground Ginger
1 cup Canola Oil
1 cup Granulated Sugar
4 whole Dark Brown Sugar
¼ teaspoons Eggs
¼ teaspoons Coconut Extract
8 ounces, weight Distilled White Vinegar
1 stick FOR THE COCONUT CREAM CHEESE FROSTING
½ teaspoons Cream Cheese, Softened To Room Temperature
¼ teaspoons Butter, Softened To Room Temperature
3-¾ cups Coconut Extract
description: Coconut Carrot Easter Cake is the perfect, sweet end to a traditional Easter brunch. It has such a moist crumb, loads of flavor and a luscious frosting!

name: The Easiest Homemade Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients:
250 milliliters Cream
395 grams Canned Sweetened Condensed Milk
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
description: The easiest vanilla ice cream you will ever make, using only 3 ingredients and no ice-cream maker. No cooking, no egg yolks, no fuss. It’s soft and creamy and super delicious!

name: Butterfinger Eggs with Vanilla
ingredients:
2 cups Candy Corn
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
15 ounces, weight Creamy Peanut Butter - Not The All-Natural Kind
16 ounces, weight Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
1 Tablespoon Crisco
description: Chocolate coated peanut butter eggs with a hint of vanilla are what everyone wants to find in their Easter basket this year.

name: The Best Homemade Taco Seasoning
ingredients:
1/4 cup ground cumin
1/4 cup kosher salt
2 tablespoons garlic salt
2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper
2 tablespoons smoked paprika

name: The Ultimate Queso Bean Dip
ingredients:
Two 16 ounce cans Old El Paso Refried Beans
4 tablespoons butter, unsalted
1/4 cup all purpose flour
1/4 teaspoon kosher salt
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 cup heavy cream
2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, divided
10 ounce can diced tomatoes with green chilies, mild

name: Maple-Sweetened Banana Muffins
ingredients:
⅓ cup melted coconut oil or extra-virgin olive oil
½ cup maple syrup or honey
2 eggs, preferably at room temperature
1 cup packed mashed ripe bananas (about 3 bananas)
¼ cup milk of choice (I used almond milk)
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
½ teaspoon salt
½ teaspoon cinnamon, plus more for sprinkling on top
1¾ cups plus whole wheat flour
⅓ cup old-fashioned oats, plus more for sprinkling on top
1 teaspoon turbinado (raw) sugar or other granulated sugar, for sprinkling on top
description: These whole wheat, maple-sweetened banana muffins are so fluffy and moist, I bet no one can guess they're healthy muffins. They're easy to make, too, with basic ingredients and only one mixing bowl! Feel free to add mix-ins of your choice, like chocolate chips or toasted nuts. Recipe yields 11 muffins.
